name: After Afterlife
description:
After Afterlife

A short visual novel in an afterlife by Jon T.

*** Content Warning: Motorist collision, death, and ghost death? ***

I made this with, 

Unity 2020 and Fungus

Adobe Photoshop and Autodesk Sketchbook

What you're looking at,

Original characters and UI

Unlicensed images sourced online, manipulated and presented under fair use; for educational purposes only.

What you're hearing,

Dawn - Unknown Mortal Orchestra

Cycad Congo, Everlasting Tendrils, Photosynesthesia, Hello, I am Plant - Louie Zong

Sound effects - freesound.org
